title: Rules of Love & Grammar / I Let You Go / The Dollhouse / Sit! Stay! Speak!
description: RULES OF LOVE & GRAMMAR: Here's the perfect recipe for a do-over: lose your job, lose your boyfriend, and have the ceiling cave in on you.I LET YOU GO: It begins with a hit-and-run accident and a woman desperate to escape the aftermath. Is it a crime that will never be solved?THE DOLLHOUSE: New York's Barbizon Hotel for Women in 1952 was a world unto itself. Now it's gone condo, but the mysteries of the past still haunt the hallways.SIT! STAY! SPEAK! A dilapidated house, far away in Eunice, Arkansas, is an unexpected inheritance. The town's population is very tine, but they will prove unforgettable.
author: Reader's Digest Association
